summary: The customer was looking for a new phone and the customer service agent was able to provide them with information about the Contoso 10X. The phone has 128GB of storage, a dual-lens 12MP camera, and a battery life of up to 24 hours on a single charge. It also has an expansive 6.5-inch display and is compatible with the latest 5G network. The customer service agent provided additional information about the phone's features, cost, and payment plans. The customer was interested in the phone and the customer service agent was able to start the purchase process.
